metadata.title: Turtle Fur Mens in The Wild Beanie
features: Size: Adult regular fit, One Size fits most. Also fits juniors and teens.
Machine knit 95% Acrylic/4% Nylon/1% Elastane winter hat.
Fully-lined self-lined for double-layer protection from the elements.
Cuffed at the ears for extra protection on those extra snowy days.
Goes great with any winter or cold weather outfit.
description: This acrylic/nylon beanie is for the Turtle Fur super fan. Or not. Maybe you just like turtles and have a passion for weekend adventures in the mountains. The acrylic fabric is soft and cozy, and the jacquard stitching gives it a classic (and classy) look. Turtle Fur is stitched around the cuff, while the crown features a beautiful mountain landscape. Self-lined, it's a midweight necessity for year-round hiking, a great solution to helmet hair after a day on the slopes, or your new go-to accessory for mornings on the xc ski trails. Cuff at the bottom for an extra layer of warmth where it matters most, and topped with a multicolor yarn pom.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "15 x 12 x 1 inches; 3.36 Ounces", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "October 7, 2021", "Manufacturer": "Turtle Fur"}
